alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 12:25PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir affecting Custer County. .High mountain snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.3 feet, Lowland flooding below Mackay Dam through the Darlington Flats. US Highway 93 may be impacted at the curve by Leslie between 3900 North and 4050 North. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM MDT Sunday was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river level below the reservoir is expected to remain in minor flood stage. - Flood stage is 4.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.6 feet on 06/21/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Lost River Mackay Reservoi 4.3 4.5 Sun 11 am MD 4.5 4.5 4.5 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
